description:
Add a 'Load Sample Project' button in empty states that instantly populates the board with example tasks across different columns. Include a sample software project, personal tasks, or content calendar depending on detected use case.

**Rationale:** Users learn best by example. Sample data helps them understand the tool's structure and capabilities without needing to create content from scratch, reducing onboarding friction.
title: One-Click Sample Project Generator

descriptionHistory.description:
